title: Prespa agreement
summary: The Prespa agreement,[lower-alpha 1] also known as the Treaty of Prespa, the Prespes agreement or the Prespa accord, is an agreement reached in 2018 between Greece and the Republic of Macedonia, under the auspices of the United Nations, resolving a long-standing dispute between the two. Apart from resolving the terminological differences, the agreement also covers areas of cooperation between the two countries in order to establish a strategic partnership between them.
